segments.text: Can you go to the store for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I can go to the store for you . What do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a couple things , here's a list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything else that you want me to pick up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I think that's all that I need .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any other place you would like me to go to for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you can , could you pick up my prescription for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , no problem . Is your prescription ready ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . It should be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I'll pick it up for you .
segments.speaker: S2
